title: Colum Eastwood – 2022 Comments on FIFA and OneLove Armband
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Colum Eastwood, the SDLP MP for Foyle, on Twitter on 21 November 2022.
content:
FIFA have corrupted the World Cup, that’s where the focus should be. Players should never have been put in this position.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
